short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share current tab or selected text to the supported native apps on your computer. Powered by Web Share API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Works only on secured pages, and requires Chrome 93+ on Windows and ChromeOS.

Visit our home page for more details: https://browsernative.com/web-share-api-extension/
